data.title: National Guard Medal of Honor Recipients by State
data.meta_description: ALABAMA Corporal Sidney E. Manning (WWI) Major Charles W. Davis (WWII-Pacific) ARIZONA Bacon, Nicky Daniel (Vietnam) Chief Warrant Officer Frederick Edgar Ferguson (Vietnam) CALIFORNIA Major General William F. Dean (Korea) Captain Reginald B. Desidero (Korea)
